component.name: ItemTemplateRowList
component.script:
sub init() m.eventPoster = m.top.findNode("eventPoster") m.eventTitle = m.top.findNode("eventTitle")
m.eventPoster.observeField("loadStatus","handleImageLoadingStatus") end sub
function itemChange() itemContent = m.top.itemContent m.eventPoster.uri = itemContent.posterUrl m.eventTitle.text = itemContent.title m.eventTitle.font = Hind_Regular(25) end function
function onWidthUpdate() m.eventPoster.width = m.top.width m.eventPoster.loadWidth = m.top.width m.eventTitle.maxWidth = m.top.width
end function
function onHeightUpdate() m.eventPoster.height = m.top.height m.eventPoster.loadHeight = m.top.height m.eventTitle.height = m.top.height*0.10 m.eventTitle.translation = [0,m.top.height+10] end function
